analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0xb7143c8b8b1443ca43ed735577cf524e0ffe94f3.sol:
	Contract PainPoints has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xb7143c8b8b1443ca43ed735577cf524e0ffe94f3.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xb7143c8b8b1443ca43ed735577cf524e0ffe94f3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0xb7143c8b8b1443ca43ed735577cf524e0ffe94f3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0xb7143c8b8b1443ca43ed735577cf524e0ffe94f3.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
